a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Child mortality rate by source, World
The estimated share of newborns who die before reaching the age of five. This is compared between estimates
from the UN Population Division, the UN Inter-agency Group for Child Mortality Estimation (UN IGME), and the
Institute of Health Metrics and Evaluation (IHME).
Data source: UN, World Population Prospects (2024); Institute of Health Metrics and Evaluation (2022); United Nations Inter-agency
